doric_the_crafter_quest.hint_0: Go to the Quests page to start Doric The Crafter quest!
doric_the_crafter_quest.hint_1: Doric the Crafter quest is in progress! Try and finish that before continuing.

the_gem_seeker_quest.hint_0: Go to the Quests page to start The Gem Seeker quest!
the_gem_seeker_quest.hint_1: The Gem Seeker quest is in progress! Try and finish that before continuing.

the_achiever_quest.hint_0: Go to the Quests page to start The Achiever quest!
the_achiever_quest.hint_1: The Achiever quest is in progress! Try and finish that before continuing.

stardust_expert_quest.hint_0: Go to the Quests page to start Stardust Expert quest!
stardust_expert_quest.hint_1: Stardust Expert quest is in progress! Try and finish that before continuing.

combat_tutor_quest.hint_0: Purchase any weapon and start the Combat Tutor quest!
combat_tutor_quest.hint_1: Combat Tutor quest is in progress! Try and finish that before continuing.

ent_boss_quest.hint_0: If you haven't already, unlock the Ent Boss quest by fighting in the forest and then try your luck!
ent_boss_quest.hint_1: Ent Boss quest is in progress! If you're having trouble, try using a bow and arrows.

faradoxs_introduction_quest.hint_0: Go to the Quests page to start Faradox's Introduction quest! Get your staff at the ready!
faradoxs_introduction_quest.hint_1: Faradox's Introduction quest is in progress! Try and finish that before continuing.

fisherman_quest.hint_req: It's time to unlock fishing! Go squash some pesky spiders, make a net from string (click on it) and try using it!
fisherman_quest.hint_0: Go to the Quests page to start The Fisherman quest!
fisherman_quest.hint_1: The Fisherman quest is in progress! Try and finish that before continuing.

combat_collection_log_quest.hint_req: Venture into the forest and slay a wolf so you can start the Combat Collection Log Quest!
combat_collection_log_quest.hint_0: Go to the Quests page to start Combat Collection Log quest!
combat_collection_log_quest.hint_1: Combat Collection Log quest is in progress! Try and finish that before continuing.

tank_boss_quest.hint_0: Go to the Quests page to start Tank Boss quest!
tank_boss_quest.hint_1: Tank Boss quest is in progress! If you're having trouble, try getting a poisoned weapon.

thief_leader_quest.hint_req: Kill 3 thieves to unlock the Thief Leader quest! Money burning a hole in your pocket? Try brewing some Monster Select potions.
thief_leader_quest.hint_0: Go to the Quests page to start Thief Leader quest!
thief_leader_quest.hint_1: Thief Leader quest is in progress! Try and finish that before continuing.

dad_goblin_quest.hint_0: Go to the Quests page to start Dad Goblin quest!
dad_goblin_quest.hint_1: Kill some goblins for a mask. If you have that already, after talking to Dad Goblin go fight some more goblins.
